import { React, useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { setInfo } from '../slice/infoSlice'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const Login = () => { const info = useSelector((state) => state.info.default); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [email, setemail] = useState(''); const [password, setpassword] = useState(''); const [memberInfo, setinfo] = useState(); const notify = () => { toast("Giriş Yapıldı") toast.success("Bilgileriniz sisteme kaydedildi", { position: toast.POSITION.TOP_CENTER }); }; const handleChange = (e) => { if (e.target.name === 'email') { setemail(e.target.value); console.log(email) } else if (e.target.name === 'password') { setpassword(e.target.value); console.log(password) } setinfo({ email: email, password: password }) } const handleClick = (e) => { if (info.email !== '' && info.password !== '') { dispatch(setInfo({ email: memberInfo.email, password: memberInfo.password })); console.log('basarılı') notify(); } else { console.log('boş yollama') } setemail(''); setpassword(''); } return (

) } export default Login
